duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a mobility assistant and optimize patient mobility using specialized patient-lifting equipment under the supervision of a registered nurse.
Manage the nurse call system needs, answer telephones, stock supplies/equipment, file, and ensure a clean and uncluttered environment of care.
Provide nursing support to achieve the organization's mission of excellent patient care and nursing's vision of setting a new standard of excellence in autonomous and accountable nursing practice.
Demonstrate strong oral and written communication skills.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent; college degree preferred.
